info.name: Guepard Public API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Guepard database management platform with all 54 endpoints organized by functional groups

exec: console.log('No access token found, please login first');
// Save user info from auth response

item.name: üîê 3rd Party Authentication
item.description: Third-party authentication endpoints for login, logout, and session management

request.description: Start the login process with a third-party provider
Resume the login process with authorization code
Verify the current session and get access token
End the login process and clean up session

item.name: üîê Supabase Authentication
item.description: Supabase authentication endpoints for login, logout, and session management

request.description: Login with Supabase authentication to get access and refresh tokens
Refresh access token using refresh token
Logout and invalidate tokens

item.name: üèóÔ∏è Deployments
item.description: Deployment management - create, read, update, delete database deployments

request.description: Get all deployments for the authenticated user
Create a new database deployment
Get detailed information about a specific deployment
Update deployment configuration
Delete a deployment and all associated resources
Update deployment events and status
Get current status of a deployment
Get compute resource status for deployment

item.description: Branch management - create, update, and checkout database branches

[
